variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 2.00% on the portion of income up to $1000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 4.00% on the portion of income over $1000 up to $6000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 5.00% on the portion of income over $6000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_3 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all three brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
